name: Pinpoint Pickup
overview:
Pinpoint Pickup mobile technology enables town car bookings from your phone.

Customers may reserve town car service up to a week in advance or in as little as an hour through our free “Ride in Style” iPhone, Android and Blackberry app, or our web/mobile site at http://www.pinpointpickup.com.

Service is available in the greater metropolitan areas of Seattle, Los Angeles/Orange County, San Francisco, Dallas/Fort Worth, Boston, Las Vegas, Phoenix, and Tucson.

Simply tell us where you are, where you’d like to go, and when. No need to set up an account or lengthy profile. If GPS is enabled on your phone, our app will use your current address as the default pickup location. You’ll be quoted a flat, guaranteed rate from one of our established local operators in your area. If you accept the ride, we will locate a driver, who will confirm your ride via text message, and may call to confirm details.

The service is intended to take the hassle out of luxury transportation, whether for airport/business travel or for special occasions.

video_embeds.description: Describes how to use Pinpoint Pickup’s mobile app, ‘Ride in Style,’ to summon a sedan to get you where you want to go, when you want to go.
There are plenty of ways to ride, but there’s only one way to Ride in Style.
Steve needs to make it to a last-minute meeting downtown, and rush-hour traffic has already started. What to do?
